safetyTips: Everything we handle is done so with safety & care whilst using gloves, your orders are delivered to your door whilst maintaining the required distance. Payment is requested via bank transfer or PayPal, no cash!
name: COASTAL GREEN
description: Coastal Green! We are a local family run business based in Folkestone offering a personal delivery service to residents in Ashford. We sell indoor plants, succulents & accessories with a real emphasis on bringing the outdoors in, especially during lockdown to help boost your physical and mental well being. Min order £30 plus £5 delivery to Ashford. Order via social media, email or phone! Please follow us on Facebook & Instagram, our website will be launched soon!
